alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Latimer (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 1:40AM CST until January 15 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST TUESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO NOON CST MONDAY... ...WIND CHILL WATCH IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. Very cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero. * WHERE...Haskell and Latimer Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from noon today to noon CST Monday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions with the snow thru Monday morning. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 1-844-465-4997 or go to okRoads.org.
